content: कड् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> (कडति-ते, कडित) {@--1@} To be proud. {@--2@} To unhusk; <ab>cf.</ab> कंड्. {@--3@} To be disturbed or confused. {vII.v} {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> To eat, consume. {vIII.v} {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To protect. {@--2@} To remove the chaff or husk of grain. {@--3@} To break off a part, separate or detach, tear.
